meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

vlive.korean: 빨리 여러분들 앞으로 다시 찾아오고 싶었지만... I wanted to be back to you, soon. 듣기 View video W PROJECT : [W PROJECT] 1분1초(돌아와줘) V LIVE
vlive.english: I wanted to be back to you, soon.

vlive.korean: [로마 뷰를 보여주고 싶었지만...] [Though she wanted to show the view of Rome...] View video Apink : [CH.RONG] ITALY Vlog #02 ROME
vlive.english: [Though she wanted to show the view of Rome...]

vlive.korean: [바쁜 와중에도 뽀랑단 우정들 선물까지 챙긴 우리뽀] 컵홀더도 받고 싶었지만 거기까지는 못 갔습니다. Although I want to go get a cupholder, I couldn't go all the way there. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 뽀랑둥 만나면 반갑다고 뽀뽀뽀💋 (Bona's talking about her birthday)
vlive.english: Although I want to go get a cupholder, I couldn't go all the way there.

vlive.korean: 보고 싶었지만. We missed you. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] 함께 보는 '어느 멋진 날'😙
인사하고 싶었지만 어쩔 수 없었어요. I wanted to say hello, but I couldn't. 듣기 View video Apink : Apink Diary3 EP.04 (3rd Album 'Pink Revolution' Showcase)
vlive.english: I wanted to say hello, but I couldn't.

examples.korean: I wanted to go camping but the others quickly vetoed that idea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 캠핑을 가고 싶었지만 다른 사람들이 그 생각을 즉각 거부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wanted to go camping but the others quickly vetoed that idea. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She wanted to tell him the whole truth but she checked herself—it wasn’t the right moment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그에게 모든 사실을 말하고 싶었지만 참았다. 때가 적절하지 않다고 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to tell him the whole truth but she checked herself—it wasn’t the right moment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He wanted to answer back, but he forbore from doing so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 말대답을 하고 싶었지만 (그러는 걸) 참았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He wanted to answer back, but he forbore from doing so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was sorely tempted to complain, but I didn’t. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 몹시 불평을 하고 싶었지만 하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was sorely tempted to complain, but I didn’t. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I wanted to talk to him but he was nowhere to be found. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그와 이야기를 하고 싶었지만 어디에서도 그를 찾을 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wanted to talk to him but he was nowhere to be found. Add to Wordbook
